seg.seg: inclining ([his] hea)d he effected his mother’s pardon, and before the eyes of Daśagrīva he went from the town of Laṅkā and vanished towards Rāma. Thereupon
the hero Rāma anointed Vibhīṣaṇa as king and already gave him the kingship in the town of Laṅkā under the title of Laṅkeśvara [“lord of Laṅkā”]. Because of this
Daśagrīva with his ministers was all finished. || In the N.-tune:|| At the time that company had to be gathered
Rāvaṇa split the company out of ignorance. At the time that power had to be given,, he split the power of the Rākṣasas and struck
Vibhīṣana. The proper advice from his brother he misinterpreted and the (good) dignity was lost for him. Vibhīṣana vanished from him and so vanished
Die richtige Anweisung seines Bruders nahm er [scil. Rāvaṇa] falsch auf.
His brother's proper instruction he [i.e. Rāvaṇa] took the wrong way.
his rule, and he perished with the town Laṅkā. 1. Even more the opposite of knowledge, as well as of power, strength [and] energy,
is inertia indeed. Skilful ones, too, for lack of wisdom, lose their life just because of their skill, at the wrong time.
Just like that at another occasion four craftsmen intended to go to some other country
There, when they manifested the skilfulness and merit of their respective skills,
one [of them] says: Through my art this is my ability: If I find the bones of a deceased,
If I find the bones of a deceased, even [if] they have fallen apart, I will put them together again.
Wenn ich von einem Gestorbenen seine Knochen, auch [wenn sie] auseinandergefallen [sind], finde, werde ich sie wieder zusammensetzen.
If I find the bones of one who has died, even [when they have] fallen apart, I will put them together again.
even [if] they have fallen apart, I will put them together again. The second says: But I
But I will join the bones completely with the sinews.
Der Zweite sagt: "Ich aber werde euch eben die Knochen sämtlich mit Sehnen zusammenfügen."
The second one says: "Myself, I will join for you the bones with the sinews entirely."
will join the bones completely with the sinews. The third says: But the bones with flesh,
But I will restore the bones with flesh, blood, skin, outer skin, and hair, exactly like before.
Der dritte sagt: "Ich aber werde ihm eben die Knochen mit Fleisch, Blut, Haut, Fell(?) [und] Haar genauso wie zuvor völlig [wieder]herstellen."
The third one says: "I, however, will entirely [re]produce for it, exactly as before, precisely the bones with flesh, blood, skin, fur(?) [and] hair."
